about_me.des: Hello, my name is David Goerig. I am from Village-Neuf in France near the border of Switzerland and Germany. I'm studying software engineering at Epitech France, and I am currently doing a double degree at the Uniservity of Kent. I have been programming front-end and back-ends application for more than 5 years now. I am interested in all kinds of software programming, but I am especially interested in machine learning at the moment and try to deepen my knowledge.

projects.jalpc: This project is my project. I use javescript to get repo's information all my repos have only one request.
projects.cpython: This project is other's project. I use another request to get repo's information.

career.nextcode_des: Now I am in Nextcode and develop website with Python code for genetic analysis.
